author: mosharafMS
body:
Using the same code on pwsh on Windows 10 works but fails on Linux (Azure Cloud Shell). 
When using this code snipped 

   ```
             $certSecret=Get-AzureKeyVaultSecret -VaultName $keyVaultName -Name sslcertOrigin
		$SecretBytes = [System.Convert]::FromBase64String($certSecret.SecretValueText)
		$certCollection = New-Object System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection
		$certCollection.Import($SecretBytes,$null,[System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags]::Exportable)

		$certPassword="RandomPassword"
		$protectedCertificateBytes = **$certCollection.Export([System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType]::Pkcs12, $certPassword)**

```
the last line throws this exception 
**Exception calling "Export" with "2" argument(s): "error:0D0C6070:asn1 encoding routines:ASN1_item_pack:encode error"
At line:1 char:1
+ $protectedCertificateBytes = $certCollection.Export([System.Security. ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodInvocationException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : OpenSslCryptographicException**

Steps to reproduce
------------------
Use the above code snipped with Azure Cloud Shell (Bash). Same code works fine on Windows 10

Expected behavior
-----------------

success

Actual behavior
---------------

Exception 
**Exception calling "Export" with "2" argument(s): "error:0D0C6070:asn1 encoding routines:ASN1_item_pack:encode error"
At line:1 char:1
+ $protectedCertificateBytes = $certCollection.Export([System.Security. ...
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+ CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (:) [], MethodInvocationException
+ FullyQualifiedErrorId : OpenSslCryptographicException**


Environment data
----------------

```powershell

```


**Update:**
Using Pwsh  v6.1.0-preview3 on Ubuntu 18.04 works fine. Don't know if it's the Ubuntu version used in Cloud Shell or this bug has been fixed in preview3
